emotional_weight.description: The felt intensity of the emotional experience

emotional_density.description: How concentrated or layered the emotional content is

valence.description: The qualitative direction of the emotional experience

viscosity.description: The perceived "stickiness" or persistence of the emotion

gravity_type.description: Category or nature of the emotional pull

tether_type.description: The type of element to which the experience is emotionally anchored
tether_type.x_constraints: person, symbol, event, place, ritual, object, tradition

recall_triggers.description: Sensory or symbolic cues that reactivate the memory
recall_triggers.x_constraints: Short phrases, lowercase (e.g., "smell of bread", "old songs", "rain sounds")

nearby_themes.description: Adjacent themes or motifs connected to the experience

legacy_embed.description: Whether the moment contributes to long-term identity or life-story continuity

recurrence_pattern.description: The temporal recurrence structure extracted from the experience's context, framing, and temporal markers
recurrence_pattern.x_constraints: cyclical, isolated, chronic, emerging; NULL when pattern cannot be determined

strength_score.description: The binding strength of the emotion within the broader emotional network

temporal_decay.description: How quickly the emotional intensity is expected to diminish over time

resilience_markers.description: Indicators of stabilizing or constructive emotional processing

adaptation_trajectory.description: How the emotional state is evolving across time
